messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Unschoolingdotcomedy
messages.messageBody:
starsuncloud@... wrote:

<<<here is a message board AND an email list. We refer to both of them as
unschoolingdotcom at times.
It's the email list that gets people's knickers in a twist! Most of the time
anyway....we had a bad week at the message board not too long ago also.>>>

Okay, thanks. I'm on the e-list I just wasn't sure if there was one I didn't know about. I don't understand how to navigate the message boards though so I don't really read there.

Rebecca

messages.subject: Unschoolingdotcomedy
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/11/03 10:04:31 PM Central Daylight Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/11/03 10:04:31 PM Central Daylight Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< So, is unschoolingdotcom

and unschooling-dotcom the same e-list? >>

There is a message board AND an email list. We refer to both of them as
unschoolingdotcom at times.
It's the email list that gets people's knickers in a twist! Most of the time
anyway....we had a bad week at the message board not too long ago also.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
